# slack Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "slack" {
  token = var.token
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `token` (String) Slack API Token. This can also be set by configuring the `SLACK_TOKEN` environment variable.
